mapper.insert: insert into analysis (id, number,number_2, type, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{number_2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, number,number_2, type, description from analysis
select id, number,number_2, type, description from analysis where number= #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or number_2= #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
